sub_topic: Moduli spaces of algebraic curves and their properties
message_1: Consider the moduli space of genus 2 algebraic curves over the field of complex numbers. Find the number of irreducible components of this moduli space.
message_2: The moduli space of genus 2 algebraic curves over the field of complex numbers is denoted by M_2. It is well-known that M_2 is an irreducible algebraic variety. Therefore, the moduli space M_2 has only one irreducible component.
